body:
Comment 13 by **czarek.tomczak**: 
How can I lower the memory being reserved by Go? My Go code is mainly running only in
the main process. The other sub-processes that are being executed (renderer,
gpu-process) are mostly running Chromium code (and a small bit of Go). So I don't think
that it is necessary to reserve so much memory by Go in the subprocesses.
